transcript:
hey you you have to stop talking [¬†__¬†]
yourself you would never talk to someone
that you love the same way that you talk
to yourself so why do you talk to
yourself that way and I understand you
can't always control your first thought
that comes into your head but you can
always control your second thought and
so if you notice a thought come into
your head that is not a positive loving
self-serving thought you need to replace
it immediately with something that is
positive because you have to think of
your mind like a garden you can't plant
seeds of negativity and expect that
somehow you're just going to have a
positive life eventually the seeds that
you plant in your mind will bear fruit
later on down the road so if you want a
positive life you have to plant positive
seeds inside of your head you can't
control your first thought but you can
always control the second one
